meanings: (초상집) house of mourning, family[household] in mourning, mourner's house

vlive.korean: 주택상가 뭐 이런 거 말하지 않았어? Didn't you say things like Jutaeksanga? 듣기 View video LOVELYZ : '러블리즈 다이어리 시즌7' 7화 ('Lovelyz Diary Season 6' EP.7 )
vlive.english: Didn't you say things like Jutaeksanga?

vlive.korean: 지하상가 4층 거기! 어쩐지. The underground shopping 4th floor! No wonder. 듣기 View video UNB : UNB DEBUT [BOYHOOD] VIDEO ART SHOW
vlive.english: The underground shopping 4th floor! No wonder.

vlive.korean: 지하상가에서 쇼핑을 많이 했죠. I used to shop a lot in the underground shopping mall. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : SK-TALK TIME
vlive.english: I used to shop a lot in the underground shopping mall.

vlive.korean: 근데 거기에도 보면 구제샵들도 있고 빈티지 상가들이 있어요. There are a lot of used-clothing stores and vintage shops there. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]스케치 X 앞터V (Sketch X Early Interview)
vlive.english: There are a lot of used-clothing stores and vintage shops there.

vlive.korean: [가격이 후덜덜...] 가격이나 질이나 지하상가가 아닌 것 같아요. [The prices were shocking...] They're too expensive for underground shopping. 듣기 View video KKOSISTERS : 지하상가에서 구매한 환절기 아우터 쇼핑 하울!🛍자켓부터 코트까지 다양해~
vlive.english: [The prices were shocking...] They're too expensive for underground shopping.

examples.korean: Plans to build a new mall were deep-sixed after protests from local residents. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 새로운 상가 단지를 지으려던 계획은 지역 주민들의 저항이 있은 후 폐기되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The municipal government will plan to combine the station with neighboring small businesses to form a complex. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 시 당국은 그 역과 주변 상가들을 통합해서 복합 단지를 세울 계획이다. Neungyule
